title: 玩家无法进入服务器，疑似跟反作弊mod有关
txt_content:
问题描述：不知道在什么情况下触发的，偶尔会出现玩家进入服务器后秒退的情况，并且显示a fatal error has occured,this connect is terminated。然后再之后一段时间内都无法连接上了，除非重启服务器，是哪里卡BUG了?求解决方法。 下面是控制台的错误报告：
ERROR There was a critical exception handling a packet on channel valkyrie1.1
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 java.lang.RuntimeException: PLAYER target expects a Player arg
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLOutboundHandler$OutboundTarget$4.validateArgs(FMLOutboundHandler.java:102) ~[FMLOutboundHandler$OutboundTarget$4.class:1.7.10-1614.188]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLOutboundHandler.write(FMLOutboundHandler.java:262) ~[FMLOutboundHandler.class:1.7.10-1614.188]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.invokeWrite(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:644) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.write(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:698) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.writeAndFlush(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:688) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.writeAndFlush(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:717) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.writeAndFlush(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:893) ~[DefaultChannelPipeline.class:?]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannel.writeAndFlush(AbstractChannel.java:239) ~[AbstractChannel.class:?]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLEventChannel.sendTo(FMLEventChannel.java:139) ~[FMLEventChannel.class:1.7.10-1614.188]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at com.ilummc.valkyrie.f.run(h:520) ~[f.class:?]
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_131]
15.09 17:38:44 [玩家断开连接] 玩家 _Th 断开连接，原因: A fatal error has occured, this connection is terminated
15.09 17:38:44 [服务器] 信息 _Th退出了游戏.
15.09 17:38:45 [服务器] ERROR NetworkEventFiringHandler exception
复制代码

replies.author: MIKAZE
